items.title: Liverpool say 'no timetable' for Isak after surgery
items.summary: Liverpool striker Alexander Isak will be sidelined indefinitely after undergoing surgery Monday on a broken ankle and fibula.

items.title: Neymar has minor surgery, WC with Brazil in play
items.summary: Neymar underwent minor surgery on his left knee, his club Santos said on Monday.

items.title: Salah scores late winner in Egypt's AFCON opener
items.summary: Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah scored a stoppage-time goal to give Egypt a 2-1 win over Zimbabwe to start their Africa Cup of Nations campaign on Monday.

items.title: Sources: Madrid's Endrick heads to Lyon on loan
items.summary: Lyon and Real Madrid agreed on Monday to a six-month loan for striker Endrick, sources told ESPN. The loan does not include an option to make the move permanent.

items.title: Australia's Cummins and Lyon out of fourth Ashes Test in Melbourne
items.summary: Australia captain Pat Cummins has been rested for the fourth Ashes Test against England as his back issue is managed, while the injured Nathan Lyon has been replaced by fellow off-spinner Todd Murphy for the game in Melbourne.

items.title: Humphries: Why 'superstar' Van Veen is major threat to me and Littler
items.summary: Luke Humphries picked out Gian van Veen as a major threat to himself and Luke Littler at this year's World Darts Championship.

items.title: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week?
items.summary: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?

items.title: Penalty king Jimenez equals record - who are the Premier League's best?
items.summary: Fulham's Raul Jimenez scored his 11th Premier League penalty from 11 attempts, but who are the best spot-kick takers?

items.title: Extra spits voor Milan in aantocht: concurrent voor Gimenez is al geland
items.summary: Santiago Gimenez lijkt er een concurrent bij te gaan krijgen in de komende transferwindow bij AC Milan. De Mexicaan kampt met blessures en voldoet niet aan de verwachtingen, waardoor er volgens meerdere bronnen al een akkoord zou zijn gesloten met zijn opvolger.

items.title: Pavlidis wordt na Nederlandse dreun matchwinner voor Benfica
items.summary: Benfica heeft maandag met een minimale marge gewonnen van Famalic√£o. Vangelis Pavlidis maakte het enige doelpunt van de avond, door een strafschop binnen te schieten. De topscorer mocht aanleggen na een overtreding van Justin de Haas.

items.title: Steelers' Metcalf banned for rest of NFL regular season after altercation with Lions fan
items.summary: Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver DK Metcalf has been suspended for two games without pay by the NFL and will now miss the rest of the regular season after "initiating a physical confrontation" with a Detroit Lions fan during Sunday's victory at Ford Field.

items.title: Jong Ajax-aanvoerder Chourak: 'Hartverscheurend om Mark zo te zien'
items.summary: Het resultaat van de wedstrijd tussen Jong Ajax en RKC Waalwijk deed er maandagavond niet echt toe. Boven de wedstrijd hing een sluier van rouw, veroorzaakt door het overlijden van Elisa, de vriendin van Jong Ajax-speler Mark Verkuijl.

items.title: Top and bottom at Christmas - what does it mean?
items.summary: As we approach the halfway point of the season, what do the ghosts of Christmas past tell us about the Premier League title race and relegation battle?

items.title: Penalty king Jim√©nez dents Forest‚Äôs revival to lift Fulham clear of danger
items.summary: The one moment of true quality came when Ra√∫l Jim√©nez stood 12 yards from goal and looked at John Victor. It was a battle of wits but there was only going to be one winner. Jim√©nez stuttered, moved towards the ball at a leisurely pace, waited for Nottingham Forest‚Äôs goalkeeper to move left and then set Fulham on the path to a vital victory by sending a clinical penalty into the opposite corner. This was Jim√©nez in his element. The Mexican is not the quickest striker around but the 34-year-old is still one of the game‚Äôs sharpest thinkers. Few, after all, can match Jim√©nez for accuracy from the spot. He is calmness personified in those situations and, remarkably, is now joint top with Yaya Tour√© when it comes to players with a 100% conversion rate from penalty kicks in the history of the Premier League. items.title: Salah scores injury-time winner to rescue Egypt
items.summary: Mohamed Salah netted an injury-time winner as Egypt fought back from a goal down to win 2-1 against Zimbabwe in their Africa Cup of Nations Group B opener.

items.title: De beste penaltynemer van de Premier League speelt bij Fulham
items.summary: Fulham heeft maandagavond dankzij de specialiteit van Ra√∫l Jim√©nez van Nottingham Forest gewonnen. De spits van de Londenaren bleef zoals altijd koel vanaf elf meter en mag zich de beste penaltynemer van de Premier League noemen.

items.title: Salah bezorgt Egypte op de valreep succesvolle start op de Afrika Cup
items.summary: Egypte heeft zijn eerste wedstrijd op de Afrika Cup gewonnen. E√©n van de favorieten voor de eindzege won maandagavond met 2-1 van Zimbabwe, met dank aan een late goal van Mohamed Slaah. In de andere wedstrijd in Poule B was Zuid-Afrika te sterk voor Angola.

items.title: Alexander Isak set to miss several months of season after Liverpool confirm fractured ankle
items.summary: Record signing injured while scoring at Tottenham Swedish striker had surgery after scan on Monday Liverpool‚Äôs record signing, Alexander Isak, is facing several months on the sidelines after undergoing surgery on an ankle injury that included a fractured fibula. Isak sustained the injury as a result of a heavy challenge from Micky van de Ven while in the process of scoring in Liverpool‚Äôs 2-1 win against Tottenham on Saturday. The 26-year-old was helped off in considerable pain and MRI scans confirmed Liverpool‚Äôs initial fears of a serious problem. Continue reading...

items.title: Liverpool striker Isak has surgery on broken leg
items.summary: Scans confirm Liverpool striker Alexander Isak's left leg was broken during the club's victory against Tottenham Hotspur on Saturday.

items.title: Milan‚Äôs Serie A match in Australia called off after ‚Äòunacceptable requests‚Äô
items.summary: Milan v Como was intended for Perth on 8 February Asian Football Confederation wanted to impose conditions The proposal to play a Serie A match between Milan and Como in Perth, Australia, has been cancelled due to football sanctions and conditions imposed by the Asian Football Confederation (AFC). The game was set to become the first major European domestic league fixture to be played outside its home country but will now not go ahead because of the financial risks and last-minute complications.
